content: row 2 ws sl1 p6 p2tog p1 turn roughly at the centre of the sole row 3 rs sl1 knit until 1 st remains before the gap ssk k1 turn starting at the temporary bor work row 4 ws sl1 purl until 1 st remains before according to chart d chart d is repeated 8 9 the gap p2tog p1 turn 10 times on each round finish chart d row 16 to the temporary bor marker cut cc repeat row 3 and 4 until one unworked remove the marker and knit to the end of stitch remains on each side of the heel turn needle 2 with mc and you have just finished row 4 switch to smaller needles if desired and work continue working in the round on the rs knit in stockinette stitch until foot measures until 1 st remains before the gap ssk from approximately 4 4 5 4 5 cm / 1½ 1¾ 1¾ now on the instep sts i e the sts left on hold inches less than the desired final length onto the cable while working the heel turn are referred to as needle 1 and the sole sts i e the heel turn sts are referred to as chart d chart key needle 2 the bor is at the beginning of needle 1 place a bor marker if preferred on needle 1 i e instep continue working the established broken rib pattern as described on page 2 please note that in size m/l the broken stitch pattern starts with k1 p1 on odd rounds on needle 2 i e sole k2tog and knit to the end of the round there are now 31 35 39 sts on needle 1 and 33 37 41 st on needle 2 lady of kensington socks page 3/5 toe abbreviations work the toe decreases as follows bor - beginning of the round dpns - double pointed needles round 1 knit sts on needle 1 on needle 2 work cc - contrast colour k1 ssk knit until 3 sts remain k2tog k1 co - cast on round 2 knit k - knit round 3 on needle 1 work *k1 ssk knit until 3 k2tog - knit 2 sts together sts remain k2tog k1* repeat * - * on needle lhn - left hand needle 2 mc - main colour round 4 knit m1 2 3 4 - stitch marker 1 2 3 4 repeat rnds 3 and 4 until 21 23 27 sts m1l - make 1 left leaning knit stitch remain on each needle and you have just m1lp - make 1 left leaning purl stitch finished round 4 then repeat only round 3 until 11 m1r - make 1 right leaning knit stitch 13 15 sts remain on each needle cut the m1rp - make 1 right leaning purl stitch yarn and graft the toe p - purl p2tog - purl 2 sts together rhn - right hand needle round s - round s finishing rs -
